trans-unit.resname: CMR·59 | Body of Knowledge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 知识形体的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·59 | Body of Knowledge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·59 | Body of Knowledge | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当知识形体受到伤害时，抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·60 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brinelin, the Moon Kraken
trans-unit.target: 明月巨海兽碧鳞

trans-unit.resname: CMR·60 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or whenever you cast a spell with mana value 6 or greater, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当明月巨海兽碧鳞进战场和每当你施放法术力值等于或大于6的咒语时，你可以将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·60 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Cunning
trans-unit.target: 黠智宫廷

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当黠智宫廷进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, any number of target players each mill two cards. If you're the monarch, each of those players mills ten cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，任意数量的目标牌手各磨两张牌。若你是君主，则改为这些牌手各磨十张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eligeth, Crossroads Augur
trans-unit.target: 歧路卜算师艾力思

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If you would scry a number of cards, draw that many cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将占卜若干牌，则改为抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMR·67 | Esior, Wardwing Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spells your opponents cast that target one or more commanders you control cost {3} more to cast.
trans-unit.target: 对手施放且以由你操控之一个或数个指挥官为目标的咒语增加{3}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·67 | Esior, Wardwing Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fall from Favor
trans-unit.target: 失宠

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当失宠进战场时，横置所结附的生物，且你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step unless that player is the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 除非所结附之生物的操控者是君主，否则它于该牌手的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·69 | Forceful Denial | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forceful Denial
trans-unit.target: 聚力拒斥

trans-unit.resname: CMR·69 | Forceful Denial | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·69 | Forceful Denial | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghost of Ramirez DePietro
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂不能被防御力等于或大于3的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose up to one target card in a graveyard that was discarded or put there from a library this turn. Put that card into its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择至多一张目标在坟墓场中的牌，且须为本回合中弃掉或从牌库进入该处者。将该牌置于其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.source: Glacian, Powerstone Engineer
trans-unit.target: 魔力石技师格雷贤

trans-unit.resname: CMR·72 | Glacian, Powerstone Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {T}，横置X个由你操控且未横置的神器：检视你牌库顶的X张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·72 | Glacian, Powerstone Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·74 | Hullbreacher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 如果某对手将抓一张牌，且这不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌，则改为你派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kitesail Skirmisher
trans-unit.target: 航筝侦卫

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, another target creature attacking the same player or planeswalker gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当航筝侦卫攻击时，另一个目标向相同牌手或鹏洛客进行攻击的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Encore {4}{U} ({4}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 返场{4}{U}（{4}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：为每位对手各进行以下流程～派出一个衍生复制品，且其本回合若能攻击该对手，便须如此作。它们获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们牺牲。起动的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Laboratory Drudge

trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，如果你本回合中曾从坟墓场中施放咒语或起动坟墓场中牌的异能，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 每当商船袭劫盗或另一个海盗在你的操控下进战场时，横置至多一个目标生物。于你操控商船袭劫盗的时段内，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.target: 将目标瞬间或法术牌从坟墓场放逐。复制该牌三次。你可以施放这些复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐回忆奔腾。

trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·114 | Court of Ambition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Ambition
trans-unit.target: 野心宫廷

trans-unit.resname: CMR·114 | Court of Ambition | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当野心宫廷进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·114 | Court of Ambition | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card. If you're the monarch, instead each opponent loses 6 life unless they discard two cards.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，对每位对手而言，除非他弃一张牌，否则失去3点生命。若你是君主，则改为对每位对手而言，除非他弃两张牌，否则失去6点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·118 | Demonic Lore | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你每有一张手牌，便失去2点生命。
